suggest.amasty/checkout-graph-ql: Install checkout-graph-ql module to be able to use One Step Checkout GraphQL queries.
suggest.amasty/module-single-step-checkout-mftf-: Install module-single-step-checkout-mftf-2 module to be able to run One Step Checkout MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
Install module-single-step-checkout-mftf-3 module to be able to run One Step Checkout MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-mixin-rewrite-patch: Install mixin rewrite patch if you have a problem with extension on Magento 2.4.2 version on Checkout
